=== About Me ===

I'm a 17 year old living in Edinburgh, Scotland. Have used Ubuntu since Dapper (upgraded to Edgy when it was released a day later).

=== Contributions ===

* MOTU - Sync requests, new packages, merges, bugfixes I keep a list of uploads/syncs/merges at http://bobbo.me.uk/ubuntu-uploads

* Support  - When not MOTU'ing i help out on the Ubuntu Forums (300+ support posts) and occasionally in #ubuntu

* Brainstorm - Idea Reviewer on brainstorm.ubuntu.com

* Testing  - Intrepid Ibex and Launchpad BETA tester

=== Specific Contributions ===

* Created example <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuDevelopment/NewPackages/ExamplePackageRequest|Package Request bug page]]</nowiki> and wrote a <nowiki>[[http://bobbocanfly.wordpress.com/2008/02/24/howto-request-a-package-for-ubuntu/|Howto for Package Requesting]]</nowiki>

* Fixed the Ubuntu packages search bar in Firefox to work with the new packages.ubuntu.com codebase

* http://bobbo.me.uk/ubuntu-uploads: All MOTU contributions

* Ubuntu Developer Week Sept 2008 - Presented "Introduction to Bzr"

=== Future ===

 I want to...

* Become a MOTU, then core-dev.

* Get more involved with MOTU-School

* I want to stay involved with MOTU, particularly with Bzr related packages
